abilities.name: Song of Convalescence
abilities.description: A song of recuperation. At the start of each ally's turn, they restore 1 HP.

abilities.name: Song of Bolstering
abilities.description: A ballad of a heroic character overcoming impossible odds. Each ally receives temporary armor equal to your MND.

abilities.name: Song of Swiftness
abilities.description: A ballad telling the story of a legendary thief. Each ally receives 1d4 additional MVMT.

abilities.name: Befuddling Tune
abilities.description: A disorienting melody that scrambles the thoughts of the listener. Select a 2x2 tile within 6 tiles. All creatures within the targeted area performa a MND contest against you. If you succeed, the target takes on the Confused status.

abilities.name: Inquisitor's Tune
abilities.description: All magical damage dealt by creatures in the current combat is reduced by 1.

abilities.name: Taunting Tune
abilities.description: A creature within 6 tiles of you rolls a MND contest with disadvantage. On fail they take on the Taunted condition.

abilities.name: Song of Vengeance
abilities.description: A song of bitter rage and woe. +1 to all damage rolls made by allies.

abilities.name: Song of Rest
abilities.description: A soothing lullaby that eases the soul. Each ally restores 1 exhaustion.

abilities.name: Song of Victory
abilities.description: All party members gain 1 additional merit if the last enemy is slain while this song is active.

abilities.name: Lethargic Tune
abilities.description: A slow, mesmerizing melody that induces sleep. All creatures in a 5x5 tile must perform a VIG contest against your MND. If a target fails, they take on the Sleep condition.

abilities.name: Charming Tune
abilities.description: A captivating melody that entrances a listener. Choose a creature within 6 tiles. That creature rolls a MND contest against you. If you succeed, the target takes on the Charmed status.

abilities.name: Cacophonous Tune
abilities.description: A chaotic and disruptive melody that hinders magic. Select a 3x3 tile within 6 tiles. Any creatures that remain within the targeted area take on the Silenced condition.

abilities.name: Song of Recovery
abilities.description: All allies within 5 tiles may roll one of their recovery dice and heal for the amount (this does not expend one of that character's recovery dice)

abilities.name: Song of Severity
abilities.description: A fierce melody recounting tales of legendary warriors. All allies roll their next basic attack, spell, or ability with advantage. On your next turn, this song's effect fades away.

abilities.name: Mocking Tune
abilities.description: Select up to 2 creatures within 6 tiles. The creatures roll a WIL contest against you. If either fails it takes 2d8 arcane damage, if it succeeds it takes half damage. Regardless it automatically fails its next check or contest.

abilities.name: Maddening Tune
abilities.description: Target up to 2 creatures within 6 tiles. That creature and all adjacent ones must roll a MND contest against you. On failure, they move 1d4 tiles in a random direction on their next turn instead of choosing their movement. They may still perform an action, but their movement is consumed.

abilities.name: Song of Resilience
abilities.description: All allies in the current combat gain resistance against all forms of damage until the end of your next turn.

abilities.name: Song of Fury
abilities.description: All allies in the current combat roll their damage with an additional die (1d6 becomes 2d6, etc)

abilities.name: Conductor's Tune
abilities.description: Choose up to 2 enemies you can see. They each roll a MND contest against you. On a fail you gain control of their movement (but not their action). At the end of each of their turns they may roll another MND contest to regain control.

abilities.name: Luckless Tune
abilities.description: All enemies in the current combat roll their next check or contest with disadvantage.
